name: The Christmas Collection
description:
ATTENTION: FOR ALL PRODUCTS AND MORE PRODUCT PHOTOS PLEASE VISIT BOWTIECATS.COM



Get your kitty ready for Saint Nick with one of our Christmas bow ties! This collection includes traditional greens and reds, with a little blue, white and gold thrown in here and there to add a little sparkle to your precious kitty's wardrobe.

-------------------------------------

Bow tie measurements are approximately 3"x1.5".

Materials used are high quality 100% colorfast cotton.

Our bow ties slip easily onto your cats existing collar, One size fits all!

P.S. Our bow ties double as a fantastic cat toy!

-------------------------------------

Please allow 5-7 business days for your order to ship and 5-10 business days for your order to arrive!

options.name: Green/Gold Dot w/ Red/Gold Stripe Center
